body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Relaxed Fit Half-Sleeve Waisted Midi A-Line Dress
features: REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.

DRAPEY FLUID TWILL: Made of 100% viscose, our non stretch viscose is extremely breathable and lightweight. With a beautiful drape and a soft, smooth finish, this fabric is comfortable and easy to wear all year round.

EVERYDAY MIDI DRESS: This versatile and figure-flattering dress seamlessly transitions from day to night. Pair with your favorite sneakers for a day exploring the city or dress up for an evening out with Amazon Essentials Women's Two Strap Heeled Sandals.

DETAILS: Features a button front closure, half sleeves with feminine gathering, and an adjustable drawstring at waist for all-day comfort and a flattering fit. The A-line shape creates beautiful drape and movement.
LENGTH: 46" from side neck on US size S.

ADDITIONAL FABRIC & CARE INFORMATION: Due to the delicate nature of viscose fabric, we recommend you wash it in cold water and hang dry to prevent fabric shrinkage and wrinkles caused by any extra heat. Gently iron or steam for an even crisper, polished look.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,868 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #141 in Women's Casual Dresses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'7" and usually wear a 10-12 US dress pant size, but I purchased this in a Large as I wanted a more loose fit. It is a very nice material that is not sheer/see-through at all. Comfy sleeves at a modest length, and the midi skirt length fell at my mid-calf. It is a very comfortable material that is breathable and was perfect on a hot summer day. And it has pockets! They are large enough to fit a cellphone. Highly recommend - although I would probably have gone for a Medium to have a more fitted shape. Kept it anyway, as I really think it will be a nice dress to use for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars attractive and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I am a teacher and bought this dress to wear to work. It is professional, yet comfortable. It allows me to move as I teach, yet does not stretch out or gap. It fits perfectly, and now that the weather has gotten colder, I simply pair it with colorful tights and a cardigan. I bought it in black. It is a true black, so pairing it is easy. It is not heavy, so it was comfortable this fall to wear with sandals.

reviews.reviewerName: Justin and Erica BraniffJustin and Erica Braniff
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple dress that works
reviews.reviewText: For what it’s meant to be, this dress really works. It’s not designed to have a “wow” factor. It achieves its goal of being easy, simple, and comfortable. But does so with a vibrant pop of color (not quite bubblegum pink-but close) and solid quality material. It’s a casual dress you can throw on for work, church, etc.It fits well. The waist cinches with a tie allowing for a more flattering fit. The sleeves are cuffed but fit comfortably.The length is a tad long for a midi but I am only 5’3” (wearing an XS).The fabric is not sheer at all—something I often worry about with this shade of pink. Durable, quality fabric while still being light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t expect these dresses to work out for me but I love them! Fabric feels good. Heavy enough to hang well but not be hot. Love the pockets and functional buttons. I got these mostly because of the buttons, so I could nurse while wearing them. I’m 5’7” and the L hits mid-calf. I was tempted to size up to XL because sometimes the bust is tight, but the Large is perfect. Hopefully they hold up through the wash! I bough the black, green flowers, white confetti and they are all super cute! White does need a slip but I found one that’s a tiny bit shorter than the last button on the dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice and simple dress, but too baggy on top with funny puckers around my hips. Easy to wear to the grocery store or around the house, but not sure i would go out to lunch or run errands in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite casual dress
reviews.reviewText: This is a great dress for many occasions. I love the pockets. Very easy to iron. Material is soft and super comfortable. The drawstring helps to make it flattering. Im 5’5 and it hit right under my knee. Already bought another’s color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this dress
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'3", 120 lbs. The size Small fits perfectly. This dress is very well made. The fabric feels wonderful. It is slightly see through, I may decide to wear a slip, but could be ok without. The sleeves are long enough. The pockets are decent sized. My only negative is that the waist drawstring is about one inch above my natural waistline, and I am short! I would love to find this dress with long sleeves and in a petite size so that it would be knee length instead of mid calf. I will point out that it has a 'shirttail hem', so that it is slightly longer in back than in front. That wasn't obvious to me in the picture, but not a big deal, either. I think this is a great bargain, just wish for more colors and options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this dress despite the poofy sleeves. I am 5'2, very busty, and normally a size 12. I got this in XL and it fit perfectly to be slightly fitted at the top and flowy at the bottom. I washed in cold and hung to dry and it did not shrink. The downfall of this dress is the ridiculous puffy sleeves. Maybe they are more flattering on a tall person but they hit me at an unflattering length and looked so matronly and poofy. I had the sleeves shortened 2 inches and the band on the sleeves removed. Now the dress is perfect. It is a bit long on me but not a big deal. The dress is so versatile! I ended up ordering another color and had the sleeves fixed on it, too.
Never bought clothes on line before but this dress fit perfectly. Can dress it up or down. Nice length and high waisted. Light weight material. Very comfortable.
Das Material ist super sehr luftig und angenehm.Gut zu tragen.Pasdform auch gut.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lavar, colgar en percha y poner!
reviews.reviewText: Me ha gustado especialmente que si no te gusta planchar, no lo necesitas con este vestido de 100% viscosa. Colgándolo con una percha, queda perfecto. Suelto y agradable al tacto.

vestito preso un po‘ per impulsoe perché una cosa fresca mi serviva. Si è dimostrato facilmente adattabili , si può aprire a volontà più o meno su e giù, molto leggero e fresco. Con una maglietta sotto invece si può usare anche quando fa più freschetto. Ottimo.
